name: GDUtils
description: Realtime Rate Notifications, leaderboard extension, epic UI redesign, auto-song mute, game fixes & more!

notification-section.name: Notifications
notification-section.description: This category is for where it should <cy>show notifications</c>, and also <cy>what notifications</c> precisely.

everywhereElse.name: Everywhere Else
everywhereElse.description: If notifications should show on any screen.

inEditor.name: In Editor
inEditor.description: If notifications should be shown in the editor.

inLevels.name: In Levels
inLevels.description: If notifications should be shown when playing levels.

newRate.name: New Rates
newRate.description: Whether or not to notify about new <cy>Rated Levels</c>

newListRate.name: New List rates
newListRate.description: Whether or not to notify about new <cy>Rated List</c>.

daily.name: Daily Levels
daily.description: Whether or not to notify about upcoming <cy>Daily Levels</c>

weekly.name: Weekly Levels
weekly.description: Whether or not to notify about upcoming <cr>Weekly Demons</c>

event.name: Event Levels
event.description: Whether or not to notify about upcoming <cp>Event Levels</c>

smallChest.name: Small Chest Notification
smallChest.description: Whether or not to notify about upcoming <cy>Daily Small Chests</c>

largeChest.name: Big Chest Notification
largeChest.description: Whether or not to notify about upcoming <cy>Daily Big Chests</c>

sfx.name: Notification SFX
sfx.description: If notifications should play a sound when they are shown.

sfx-link.name: Link Game SFX to Notification
sfx-link.description: Link the game's SFX to the GDUtils notification SFX.

sfx-volume.name: SFX Volume
sfx-volume.description:
The volume of the notification sound effect.

<cr>Can only be applied if 'Link Game SFX to Notification' is disabled.</c>

customDifficultyFaces.name: Custom Difficulty Faces
customDifficultyFaces.description: Enable custom difficulty faces for Legendary/Mythic

notification-placement-section.name: Notification Placement
notification-placement-section.description: This category is for where to <cy>show the notification</c> in the screen on a specific corner.

notificationPlacement.name: Placement
notificationPlacement.descriptionold:
Where the notification should be placed.
1 = <cy>Top Left</c> | 2 = <cy>Top Right</c>
3 = <cy>Bottom Left</c> | 4 = <cy>Bottom Right</c>

notification-appearance-section.name: Notification Appearance
notification-appearance-section.description:
This category is for <cy>setting notification boxes</c> for how it should appear.
You can also use <cb>decimals</c> in these options, such as <cy>0.5 size</c>, or <cy>3.5 seconds.</c>

size.name: Size
size.description: How big the notification should be.

time.name: Time Hold
time.description: How long the notification should be.

spotify-section.name: Spotify
spotify-section.description:
This category is for determining when <cg>Spotify</c> should toggle <cr>mute</c>.
This only works if you currently have the <cg>Spotify App</c> open.

<cy>If your music volume is set to 0, </c><cg>Spotify</c><cy>
will not be affected.</c>

inEditorSpotify.name: In Editor
inEditorSpotify.description: Disabling this will not auto-mute Spotify when you are playing music in the Editor.

inLevelsSpotify.name: In Levels
inLevelsSpotify.description: Disabling this will not auto-mute Spotify when you are playing a level, and music is playing.

spotifyApp.name: Application
spotifyApp.description: This will decide what application should be auto-muted.

design-section.name: Designs
design-section.description: This category is for changing settings to activate/desactivate <cy>designs</c> of the mod.

gauntletDesign.name: New gauntlets design
gauntletDesign.description: Changes the design of the gauntlets in the main menu.

secretLayerDesign.name: The Vault design
secretLayerDesign.description: Changes the design of The Vault.

eventLevelInfo.name: Event Level Info
eventLevelInfo.description: Adds an info button to show the current event information!

misc-section.name: Miscellaneous
misc-section.description:
This category is for any other feature for <cy>GDUtils</c>.
You can choose whether to <cy>enable</c> or <cy>disable</c> some options if you do not want them.

customBadges.name: Custom Badges
customBadges.description: Whether or not to show custom badges in <cg>Profile</c> and <cg>Comments</c>.

friendSearch.name: Search Friends
friendSearch.description: Whether or not to show the search button in the <cg>Friends List Menu</c>.

demonListPlacement.name: Demon Placements
demonListPlacement.description: Whether or not to show placements for <cr>Extreme Demons</c> from <cy>Pointercrate</c>.

demonListSelection.name: Demon List Selection
demonListSelection.description: Whether or not to select between <cg>Pointercrate</c> or <cg>AreDL</c> for placements.

levelsProtocol.name: Allow Levels Protocol
levelsProtocol.description: Whether or not to allow <cg>Geometry Dash</c> to <cy>redirect to a level</c> if you were to use a <cy>https://gdutils.com/</c> url, or <cy>gdutils:</c> protocol.

levelsProtocolButton.name: Share level URL Button
levelsProtocolButton.description: Whether or not to show the <cy>Share Level URL</c> button in the <cg>Level Info Menu</c>.

socketServer.name: Notifications Server
socketServer.description:
Allows you to <cg>receive rate notifications.</c> (Recommended to keep enabled)

Restart the game to apply changes.

previewIcons.name: Preview Icons
previewIcons.description: Show some buttons to preview icons in the <cg>Icon Kit</c> for those who haven't been unlocked yet.

background-section.name: Backgrounds
background-section.description: This category is for changing the <cy>background colors</c>.

activate-background.name: Activate Background
activate-background.description: Enables custom background and child backgrounds colors for GD.

background.name: Background
background.description: Change the color of GD backgrounds.

child-background.name: Child Background
child-background.description: Change the color of GD child backgrounds (associated with GD backgrounds).

syncBGcolor.name: Sync BG Color
syncBGcolor.description: Allows you to <cg>synchronise the GD backgrounds</c> with child backgrounds.

addChildBDGradient.name: Add child BG Gradient
addChildBDGradient.description: Adds a gradient to child backgrounds (only for level browsing).

bgchild-transparency.name: BG Child Transparency
bgchild-transparency.description: Change the transparency of child backgrounds.

bgchild-transparency-scroll.name: Transparency Opacity
bgchild-transparency-scroll.description:
Change the opacity of the transparency of child backgrounds.

<cy>0</c> - Totally <cy>transparent</c>
<cy>255</c> - Totally <cy>opaque</c>

<cy>Only works if Add child BG Gradient is enabled.</c>

credits-section.name: Credits
credits-section.description: Below are the credits for those that developed the mod, and beta-tested the mod!
